itunes:title: Burning the Toast with Harry Sultan
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Harry Sultan
itunes:summary: With Food52's revival of the Burnt Toast Podcast on the horizon, we wanted to sit down with the shows future host, Food52's current executive producer of Podcasts, and avid food consumer, Harry Sultan.
itunes:subtitle: With Food52's revival of the Burnt Toast Podcast on the horizon, we wanted to sit down with the shows future host, Food52's current executive producer of Podcasts, and avid food consumer, Harry Sultan.
